title: GetLocalDateTime (Function)
text:
FUNCTION GetLocalDateTime : ULINT
Related to
TimeZone
in
tzTimeZone
this function returns the current date and time in milliseconds since Thursday, 1.1.1970 00:00:00.000, managed in a 64 Bit data type
The default
IDateTimeProvider
implementation (
DateTimeProvider
) is in use

rows.Name: GetLocalDateTime
rows.Comment:
The current local date and time in milliseconds since
1.1.1970 00:00:00.000

rows.Name: tzTimeZone
rows.Comment: Time zone as base for caclulating local time
